products.name: Sauce Labs Backpack
products.description: Carry all the things with the sleek, streamlined Sauce Labs back pack. Perfect for school, work, or weekend getaways.

products.name: Sauce Labs Bike Light
products.description: A red light isn't the worst thing, but it's definitely not the best. Attach this to your bike to stand out.

products.name: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt
products.description: Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. Made of 100% organic cotton.

products.name: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket
products.description: It's not every day that you come across a midweight quarter-zip fleece jacket capable of handling everything from a cool day to a blustery adventure.

products.name: Sauce Labs Onesie
products.description: Rib snap infant onesie for the junior in your life. Lap-flat shoulders for easy over-the-head dressing.

products.name: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)
products.description: This classic red t-shirt is part of the Sauce Labs inventory. It's comfortable, stylish, and perfect for any occasion.
